title: Wolverine First Class: Ninjas, Gods and Divas (Trade Paperback)
description:
Kitty Pryde usually likes museums, but wouldn’t you know it…the art gallery that Wolverine’s taken her to is run by the evil HAND (they’re Ninja types), which means that DAREDEVIL & ELEKTRA can’t be too far away from the action. Then, Kitty Pryde’s got a crush, and she’s depending on Wolvie to help her get the hook-up. But what can she really expect him to do when that crush is THOR? Also, find out what happens when you cross an enraged feral fighting machine with a shiny roller-skating diva. Plus: Wolverine and the Power kids go on a special Halloween night adventure! Collecting WOLVERINE: FIRST CLASS #13-16 and X-MEN AND POWER PACK #1.
Rated A …$12.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-3535-7
